tracesoccer.title: Tracesoccer
tracesoccer.description: Tracesoccer is a modern adaptation of the classic pen-and-paper strategy game, blending strategic planning with the thrill of competition in a turn-based format. Play against friends, AI, or online opponents and outmaneuver your rival to score the winning goal!

HomeIframe.title: Play Tracesoccer Now
HomeIframe.description: Experience the thrill of Tracesoccer, a first-class strategy game available on CrazyGames. Play in your browser with HTML5 technology.

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Tracesoccer is a first-class strategy game that you can play on CrazyGames in your browser. It's a modern adaptation of the classic pen-and-paper strategy game, offering exciting gameplay for both casual players and competitive strategists.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Use the left mouse button to position where you want the ball to move.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Use QWEADZXC keys to move the ball in a specific direction.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Outmaneuver your rival to score the winning goal!
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Plan your moves carefully to outsmart your opponent.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Enjoy the thrill of competition in a turn-based format.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Play against friends, AI, or online opponents.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Play Tracesoccer in most browsers with HTML5 technology.
